name: Rotom-3.0
description: Rotom-3.0 is a actually a bot developed by @Alain_Champion, which acts as a helper for trainers on Telegram. You can check information of Pokémon, Showdown usage and check effectiveness; weakness of Pokémon types as quickly as possible, without ever leaving the app

SUDO.description: ID of users who are Devs of your bot (can use /py etc.). If you are a noob and don't know what is this, then keep the current IDs here at they are and add yours..
